releaseNotes: On the Christmas Eve, Santa has a lot of important things to do. Right now he needs helpers to prepare gifts that the kids asked for! Are you with us?
description:
Discover a colorful world of adventure in Treasure Diving. The oceans hold many stories, mysteries and secrets: ancient cities that are under water, sunken ships, treasures and mythical artifacts. They have been waiting for their heroes for many years, and maybe you will make outstanding discoveries!

Life on an underwater base is an amazing adventure!
- hundreds of exciting expeditions
- hundreds of unique treasures
- hundreds of unique quests
- hundreds of species of exotic marine life and pets
- more than 50 useful buildings and structures
- daily rewards for each player

Key features of Treasure Diving:

EXCITING STORY:
Help collect all the pieces of an old map and save Captain Jack from a terrible curse. Feel like a fearless explorer of the deep sea, go through all the tests and solve the mystery of the pirate curse!

JOURNEY:
Prepare your submarine for the journey, refill your oxygen tanks and embark on new expeditions. Enjoy the beauty of the deep sea and fantastic underwater landscapes. Outstanding discoveries await you in the game!

EXPLORE:
Explore the underwater world to meet the amazing inhabitants of the deep sea. Find a sunken fortress, unravel the mystery of the Bermuda Triangle, or discover the secret of a sunken city of an ancient civilization. Amazing adventures await you in the game!

CHARACTERS AND ENEMIES:
Only the brave conquer the seas! Somewhere, in the depths of the sea, greedy pirates and sweet-voiced sirens, a bloodthirsty kraken and an insidious sorceress are already waiting, but they will be defeated if you assemble a brave team! Meet the inhabitants of neighboring underwater stations, make friends and they will come to the rescue!

UNDERWATER PETS:
Get into farming! At your base, you can grow many types of fish and have unique marine animals. Do good, build a nursery to take care of marine life in trouble. Feed your pets and get resources to develop your station!

UNDERWATER FARM:
Develop your own garden! At your base, you can plant outlandish underwater plants, and when the fruits ripen along with the harvest on the beds, you will receive rare collectible items. It's time to equip your underwater farm!

COLLECTIBLES:
Exploring the depths of the sea, you can find many rare and unusual things. Collect the items you find and combine them into collections to get resources to develop your underwater station.

BUILDING AND CRAFTING:
Build buildings and upgrade constructions to unlock new types of crafting and create even more unique resources. Develop your underwater base and level up your submarine. Incredible adventures and the greatest discoveries await you in the game!

BASE DEVELOPMENT:
Set up decorations and build your own underwater park. Create a unique design for your station and earn extra experience points!

AMAZING FINDS:
Explore expeditions to unearth sunken treasures and mysterious artifacts. These finds promise wealth and good luck! Find out if the stories and legends that hide the depths of the sea are true!

GAME WITH FRIENDS:
Use social networks, add friends, visit the neighbors' underwater bases and help them with the housework. Make gifts, send resources and animals to please your buddies.

GAME FEATURES:
Fun 2d animations, funny characters, hundreds of colorful locations, daily events, intuitive controls and many unique game mechanics await you. Treasure Diving can be played offline, but you will need to connect to the game server to save game progress, receive and send gifts to friends.

Any questions? We will gladly answer your questions. Write to us at the support mail:
